mapper.delete: delete from tDlbSnConfig where lineId = #{lineId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and sn = #{sn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into tDlbSnConfig (lineId, sn, tenant, cartId, ip, storeId, sotreName) values (#{lineId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tenant,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cartId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{storeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sotreName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select lineId, sn, tenant, cartId, ip, storeId, sotreName,address,tel from tDlbSnConfig
